name: JayBox Alpha 0.05
description:
just some simple sandbox game i made in my free time, currently very early on in development so things may be broken and rough.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Esc - exit map

CRTL+ 1 to 5 - spawn in some items :)

CRTL + LeftArrow - Reset map (in case it goes laggy or stuck)

WHAT'S COMING NEXT:

  • Mod Support (Maps and Assets)
  • Bug Fixes (btw if you find any, lmk in the comments)
  • Add SFX and Soundtracks
  • Multiplayer (Peer-to-Peer)
    • of course this may take awhile so just keep an eye out ;)
